entity_action.description: If specified, this action will be executed on the player after they use an item.

item_action.description: If specified, this action will be executed on the _remaining_ item.

item_condition.description: If specified, the actions will only execute if this condition is fulfilled by the item _before use._

trigger.description: Defines when the action is executed, see below table for accepted values.

priority.description: Determines the execution priority of the power.
